text: The Two Gentlemen of Verona is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a comedy. It is one of the first plays he wrote. According to The Guardian, "it is far from being his most polished work". ==References== ==Other websites== * The Two Gentlemen of Verona at Project Gutenberg. * The Two Gentlemen of Verona Home Page at Internet Shakespeare Editions. * Text of the play * The Two Gentlemen of Verona at Shakespeare Illustrated * (BBC Television Shakespeare Version). Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:1580s plays
title: The Two Gentlemen of Verona
